name: VR Highway Escape Rush
description:
Move yourself and Burn up the street with this latest sequel of a car racing game in the most exciting physics based Virtual Reality environment with the fastest and thrilling adventurous track. Experience the biggest race of your life and collect the most amazing rides in your pocket through Virtual Reality.
“VR Highway Escape Rush” emerges you first time in the history of car racing through Virtual Reality Adventure. Race with your superior driving skills to beat other racers with the best mobile racing game you have ever played.
“VR Highway Escape Rush” lets you drive car while sitting comfortably on your couch through a virtual reality world combines with stunning, HD quality graphics that let you explore a virtual world while driving car and racing in the comfort of your own home. All you need to run the game in your iphone; Put your cell into VR headset and Drive the car as fast as you can.
It’s as realistic as it gets combining the laws of Physics that one gets when racing an actual car on the highway. Who needs to go head to head, car vs car when we can go race cars.
This game is all about adventure. Avoid accidents with other deadly vehicles and Get READY to astonishing physics, eye-popping tracks, and awesome cars through perilous racing tracks! This is the game you have been waiting for!
Prove that you are the best turbo racer!
Key Features:
• Stunning 3D HD quality graphics
• Smooth and realistic car handling
• Breathtaking visuals
•Different speed boosters to increase the speed
• VR based 3D Environment
• Gyro-meter based 360 degree rotation
• Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals Different exciting racing tracks
• No time Limit, unlimited play and fun Easy to learn and drive
•Best suited music tracks for locations and races
